alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 7:41PM CDT until August 11 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Shelby County in central Alabama... South central Jefferson County in central Alabama... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bluff Park, or near Hoover, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Southwestern Birmingham, Hoover, Vestavia Hills, Alabaster, Bessemer, Homewood, Pelham, Mountain Brook, Helena, Hueytown, Chelsea, Montevallo, Midfield, Brighton, Indian Springs Village, Lipscomb, American Village, Five Points South, Oak Mountain State Park and Maylene. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
